longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 1 month beyond the period of intended
  stay. 
 - Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued by
   Hong Kong (SAR China) must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) Permanent Identity Card. 
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max stay of 90 days for holders of
a Hong Kong (SAR China) "Single Entry Permit" issued to
residents of Chinese Taipei. (SEE NOTE 49397)
    NOTE 49397: Provided accompanied by a travel document for
   re-entry to Chinese Taipei, valid for at least 2 months
   beyond the period of intended stay. 
Visa required, except for A max stay of 30 days:
 - for holders of Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents
   (Tai Bao Zheng). (SEE NOTE 49397) 
     NOTE 49397: Provided accompanied by a travel document for
    re-entry to Chinese Taipei, valid for at least 2 months
    beyond the period of intended stay. 
 - for holders of Hong Kong (SAR China)  Multiple Entry
   Permit" issued to residents of Chinese Taipei. (SEE NOTE
   49397) 
     NOTE 49397: Provided accompanied by a travel document for
    re-entry to Chinese Taipei, valid for at least 2 months
    beyond the period of intended stay. 
 - for holders of a  Notification Slip for Pre-arrival
   Registration for Taiwan Residents  (PAR). (SEE NOTE 49396)
     NOTE 49396: Provided accompanied by a travel document for
    re-entry to Chinese Taipei, valid for at least 6 months
    upon arrival in Hong Kong.
Visa required, except for Holders of:
- travel documents issued by the Hong Kong Immigration
Department, endorsed with "Holder's eligibility for Hong Kong
(SAR China) Permanent Identity Card verified ; or
- a Hong Kong (SAR China) Permanent Identity Card. 
Visa required, except for Holders of an APEC Business Travel
Card (ABTC) provided endorsed  Valid for travel
to HKG":
 - traveling on business;
 - holders of a Chinese Taipei ABTC must also present an
   "Entry Permit" or "Entry Permit (iPermit)" issued by Hong
   Kong (SAR China) to residents of Chinese Taipei.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
Warning:
- Passport number and nationality must match those stated on
  the APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC).
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
